com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util

Class ReplCommController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util.ReplCommController

  • public class ReplCommController
extends Object
    Support that runs on the phone for starting REPLs associated with a form. The initial handler for the menu is set up by OnCreateOptionsMenu in Form.java.
    Author:
    halabelson@google.com (Hal Abelson), sharon@google.com (Sharon Perl)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void destroy()
      Destroy the repl server, releasing the port.
      void startListening(boolean showAlert)
      Start the phone's server listening to App Inventor.
      void stopListening(boolean showAlert)
      Don't release the port.

      • ReplCommController

        public ReplCommController(Form form)

    • Method Detail

      • stopListening

        public void stopListening(boolean showAlert)
        Don't release the port. We expect to be the only ReplCommController running on the phone at any time.

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Destroy the repl server, releasing the port.

      • startListening

        public void startListening(boolean showAlert)
        Start the phone's server listening to App Inventor.
        Parameters:
        showAlert - boolean that determines whether or not to show an alert on the phone screen
